description.label: Description
description.helper_text: Any label that will help you identify this template set in the admin. We won't show this text to the customers.
description.v8n_required: Please enter a description for this set
description.v8n_too_long: Please reduce this description to 100 characters or less

code.label: Code
code.helper_text: The template set code for applying this template set to the cart. Your customers might see this code in the URL.
code.v8n_required: Please enter a code for this set
code.v8n_too_long: Please reduce this code to 50 characters or less

language.label: Language
language.helper_text: We'll apply this language to our cart, checkout and receipt pages.
language.v8n_required: Please select a language for this set

locale-code.label: Locale
locale-code.helper_text: We'll use this locale to format prices and dates for your customers.
locale-code.v8n_required: Please select a locale for this set

payment-method-set-uri.label: Payment method set
payment-method-set-uri.helper_text: With this template set applied, your customers will see payment methods from the selected set.

delete.delete_prompt: Are you sure you'd like to remove this template set? You won't be able to bring it back.
